summary: 1967  was a common year starting on Sunday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
George Hornidge Porter, Baron Porter of Luddenham OM PRS  was a British chemist. He was awarded the Nobel Prize in Chemistry in 1967.
^ Fleming, G. R.; Phillips, D. . "George Porter KT OM, Lord Porter of Luddenham. 6 December 1920 - 31 August 2002: Elected F.R.S. 1960". Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 50: 257. doi:10.1098/rsbm.2004.0017. 
^ Phillips, D. . "Obituary: George Porter ". Nature 419 : 578. doi:10.1038/419578a. PMID 12374966.
title: George Porter
